subject: Re: C2C
author: debra.yeung
full_text:
Hi Frank & everyone on the List:
Your C2C interview was ho I finally tracked you down. I'd heard about your work over the years and seen a pitcure of your box.

I thought that you sounded grounded and you seemed to portray an air of, "this is what was heard, make up your own minds" .
What impressed me enough to share with my husband, was that the 'messages' were clear and concise, not in the least open to copious amounts of interpretation.

I heard you reiterate that fact that you had the files for th public to listen to. But I think I fell asleep before they were played, or did they even get aired? 

The interview intrigued me enough to seek out this list and learn more. 

Did I sense a "Doomsday" feel to your end of things, not at all, but unfortunately I was a little disappointing by George Noory's attitude which I sense to be a bit  'patronizing'. Something that I was quite surprised to  note. 

I was really looking forwards to hearing more supporting data.
So that is what an "outsider" perceived from your interview one I had been waiting to hear for some time.

Can anyone tell me how long was Helen Gurley Brown's interview?  I know she is quite favoured guest on C2C.

Anyways, I am here to learn what I can...
Deb




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Well, our show time seems to have been cut short by what I think was
> favoritism by Noory- Murphy and I were not allowed to present anything to
> support what we were saying, and made to look like were doomsday crazy or
> something. No more firggin' radio shows!
> 
>  Remember what I've said about self proclaimed experts in this field!
> 
>  Frank-S
>
